raw: Once upon a time there was a young fellow who enlisted as a soldier, conducted himself bravely, and was always at the very front when it was raining bullets.
His parents were dead, and he had no longer a home, so he went to his brothers and asked them to support him until there was another war.
We have no work for you.
object: We have no work for you.
options: ['We have no work for you.', 'We had no works for you.', 'We been no done for you.']
answer: We have no work for you.

raw: The poor bride-to-be dressed herself entirely in black, and when she thought about her future bridegroom, tears came into her eyes.
